reviewText:
Chaka looks and sings great in this video of a live performance.
A very small part of it looks like it was taken with her posing and smiling from "up above" in a studio, but it's so well integrated into the film that it doesn't take anything away from this great show. Her backup singers, band, and dancers are all wonderful also. Check it out!

I purchased this VHS tape for my brother.  So far, he has not played the tape yet; hopefully, it will be as stated.  An update will come as soon as I hear from my brother how it played, etc.  Fast delivery and tape is in very good condition.
